title: Teaching with AI
summary: Educators are using ChatGPT in various ways to enhance student learning. Dr. Helen Crompton encourages role-playing challenging conversations, while Fran Bellas suggests using ChatGPT to create quizzes, tests, and lesson plans. Dr. Anthony Kaziboni uses ChatGPT to assist non-English speakers with translation and English writing. Geetha Venugopal teaches students about critical thinking and advises them to verify ChatGPT's answers through primary resources. Prompts for educators include creating lesson plans, developing effective explanations, helping students learn by teaching, and acting as an AI tutor.
